user.title: Energy Export Monitor Setup
user.description: Configure the Energy Export Monitor integration to control your battery discharge based on grid export and solar forecast.

data_description.discharge_button: Alpha ESS helper boolean entity that controls discharge (e.g., input_boolean.alphaess_helper_force_discharging)
data_description.discharge_power: Alpha ESS discharge power control in kW (e.g., number.alphaess_template_force_discharging_power)
data_description.current_soc: Sensor showing current battery state of charge
data_description.pv_energy_today: Cumulative PV energy generated today in kWh
data_description.grid_feed_today: Cumulative grid export today in kWh
data_description.solcast_total_today: Solcast forecast total for today in kWh
data_description.solcast_forecast_so_far: Solcast forecast produced so far today in kWh (optional)
data_description.min_soc: Minimum battery SOC before discharge is disabled
data_description.safety_margin: Additional margin to stay within T&C limits (default 0.5 kWh)

error.entity_not_found: Selected entity not found or unavailable

init.title: Energy Export Monitor Options
init.description: Update the configuration options for Energy Export Monitor.
